ygData.subject: Solo opportunities for a 25th level bard
ygData.msgSnippet: I think I want to try soloing some now.  Anyone have suggestions of places I can solo successfully at 25th level?  At 23d level, I couldn t solo rooks in SK.
ygData.messageBody:
I think I want to try soloing some now. Anyone have suggestions of places I
can solo successfully at 25th level? At 23d level, I couldn't solo rooks in
SK. I think I might be able to do it now. This assumption is based on
better combat skills/hit points plus I now have the Psalm of Warmth. Is it
safe to assume that weaving Psalm of Warmth with two other songs will do
more damage than a Bellow? How much do mobs get burned for per hit?

Thanks
Galtin of E'ci
